product_name: Seattle Sports Dry Doc Map Case - Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: This tough, small-size map case protects charts, maps and other documents against the elements with a PVC-free, puncture-resistant film and a waterproof, resealable closure.
short_description: This tough, small-size map case protects charts, maps and other documents against the elements with a PVC-free, puncture-resistant film and a waterproof, resealable closure.
